title: REAMED CORN CASSEROLE
directions: Heat oven to 350°. Grease and flour a 7" x 11" baking dish; set aside. Whisk flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl. Melt 8 tbsp. butter in a 1-qt. saucepan and transfer to bowl with eggs, corn kernels and reserved liquid, and cream-style corn; stir until combined. Whisk in dry ingredients and pour into prepared dish. Dot with remaining butter; bake until golden and a toothpick inserted in the middle comes out clean, about 35 minutes.
ingredients: 11 tbsp. unsalted butter, plus more for greasing
2⁄3 cup flour, plus more for dusting
1 (15-oz.) can corn kernels, drained, 1⁄4 cup liquid reserved
